text: hello and welcome to cupcake addictions
Mother's Day flower garden in a jar
tutorial for me to be showing you how to

then turn them into these gorgeous
little flower garden cupcakes perfect
for Mother's Day I've had lots of

mom's recipe any chocolate cake you like

this I've got one unbroken mini Oreo

that I've found to do this particularly

you can of course just spoon your

to be a particularly fine piping bag and

Center and then I'm taking my yellow and

take your Pocky I actually found green

facedown on that wax paper you want to

stick when your cupcake jars are out of
the oven and completely cooled I like to
just trim a little bit of the top away

attaching is a little bit later so that

so I can pick them up and move them

can either use chocolate frosting here
but I opted for Nutella it saves me
having to make a frosting and who

so I'm just grooving in spoonfuls of my
Nutella to bring it up to a level

to clear out any air bubbles you can
actually see an air bubble popping on
top there repeat that with all of your
jars and then you want to take a little

once you're happy that you've got all of

decide which one's gonna suit which job
